participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Caring and passionate about animals, with a love for family and adventure.
participant_1.background: I'm well connected in the entertainment industry. I am a lesbian. I’m deathly afraid of snakes, but not bugs. I usually wake up early in the morning to help my wife get the kids ready for school. I play with my dog and learn about animals because I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, always seeking to capture life's moments through photography.
participant_2.background: I am a young woman who loves to ride my bike and spend time with my pets. I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health. I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera. I enjoy playing tennis with my mother, and it is a great way for us to stay fit. I enjoy playing with my cat Seven of Nine.

content.text: Hi there, I'm looking forward to this conversation with you!
Hey there! I'm looking forward to it too! What are you passionate about?
I am passionate about animals and my wife. I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up!
That's so cool! I love animals too. I have a cat named Seven of Nine.
Oh my gosh, that's a great name for a cat! I love Star Trek!
Me too! What's your favorite Star Trek series?
I love all of them but The Next Generation is my favorite.
Mine too! I love Picard and Data.
I know, they're the best! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to ride my bike, play tennis, and take pictures.
That's awesome! I love to ride my bike too. I'm not very good at tennis but I enjoy playing it.
Me neither! I just like to get out and exercise.
Same here! I love being active.
It's so important to stay healthy.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
